Body: I have a Huawei u8160 running Cyanogenmod 7.2 .I have been looking for the fuse.ko module for my phone, but whenever I find anything ,terminal emulator tells me that it is incompatible!I want it to enable NTFS file system support using this tutorialSo I was wondering where I can find the appropriate fuse.ko module?NOTE : I've already seen this link but I don't think that's what I want.
Title: where can I find fuse.ko file for my huawei u8160?

history.Text: I have a Huawei u8160 running Cyanogenmod 7.2 .I have been looking for the fuse.ko module for my phone, but whenever I find anything ,terminal emulator tells me that it is incompatible!I want it to enable NTFS file system support using this [tutorial][1]So I was wondering where I can find the appropriate fuse.ko module?**NOTE :** I've already seen this [link ][2]but I don't think that's what I want.  [1]: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=31624796  [2]: http://fuse.sourceforge.net/
where can I find fuse.ko file for my huawei u8160?
